1413620.name: Ironseed 25th Anniversary Edition Soundtrack
1413620.description:
Original soundtrack written by Andrew Sega, also known as Necros of the Psychic Monks, for the game Ironseed.

Songs are mostly a mixture of techno/trance with cinematic themes for the Introduction and Ending. Each alien has their own unique sound.

The tracks were created in ScreamTracker3 in Amiga MOD and S3M formats.
developers: Andrew Sega, Necros of the Pyschic Monks
